website_summaries.verdict: This revamped Acer Aspire 5 configuration is a welcome improvement over its predecessor, and a decent, if compromise-laden, choice for shoppers eyeing a big-screen laptop on a budget.
pros: Decent power for everyday computing tasks

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loving this Acer laptop especially the ultra fast boot time thanks to it's 512 Gb SSD. Took a while to adjust from Windows 7 to Windows 10 but it is quite intuitive and now I rather like it. So far I can't really fault this laptop, just hope it lasts as long as my old Sony Vaio which is still going strong after 5 years of everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Gall

customer_reviews.title: Impressive laptop but no backlit keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop with impressive processor (i5-8265U),15.6” HD screen, 8 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD but photos show it has keyboard with backlight which it does not have. So not sure which model photos are of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on an external disc drive
customer_reviews.text: Basically this is a very good machine, unfortunately either due to windows 10 or the updates from Microsoft or Acer, it wil not read/write on an external disc drive. The assistance or rather the lack of assistance from Microsoft or Acer was pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality laptop, Long lasting battery life
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was bought under the pretence that it had a back-lit keyboard, which it does not. The description and pictures have since been updated to reflect this, as before the pictures clearly showed a laptop with a back-lit keyboard. Despite this, the laptop is quick and the screen is clear and bright. The camera isn't the best quality but its perfectly fine for video calling. The battery is the best feature of this, as it lasts for hours. I usually get around 5-6+ hours of constant use which is great when you are using it on the go. It does charge quite slowly though. Good quality laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No backlit keyboard as advertised at time of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Home use, but extremely disappointed at the lack of backlit keyboard since this was one of the deciding factors when ordering. Had this been made clear during the ordering process i would have selected another model. In general though the laptop performs well, but product info could be greatly improved by more transparency in included features. Misleading advertising, but I note that this has now been altered - after sale!!!
customer_reviews.author: boabby50

customer_reviews.title: Super laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to Windows 10 professional to get 64 bit functionally. Very happy with the laptop purchase. Big improvement in speed and display performance over my 7 year old laptop running Windows 7. I was able to get most of my apps up and running quickly thanks to Dr Google. Printing to my wireless printer was easily setup. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. This is a solid piece of kit and works very well. Excellent screen and good solid keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbo

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very long battery life. I really am pleased with this laptop. Be aware it doesn't have a DVD/DVDR optical drive or a SD card slot but just the expected USB and HDMI ports. Performance wise a great machine to have and the fast boot up/ Boot down time is a pleasure , never do I feel I have to wait for any apps to open or run. The screen isn't as good as some other machines I have seen but this wasn't anything that I have found an issue or worried about..
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. Nothing particularly outstanding in my view. The screen is average, poor colour depth and looks a bit washed out and pale. You can get it a lot cheaper than Amazon is charging. It's a little disappointing and I think for the price you can probably do better.
customer_reviews.author: MikeP

customer_reviews.title: Fast operation and great value
customer_reviews.text: A nice machine which does all that I want. Boots up fast and silently. Operation is faster than I expected. Great value for money. The only proviso I have is that it's a bit sensitive to movement of hand/mouse sometimes giving unintended results.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N

customer_reviews.title: An  excellent fast responsible  laptop from Acer
customer_reviews.text: Set up is clearly explained and once all downloads have been carried out you're set to go. A very fast and responsive laptop with only one issue being no keyboard back light.A truly fanyastic
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Brill.....
customer_reviews.text: Over the moon with it very powerful for the cost overall good purchase. Note you will have to buy a usb c sd card converter as the laptop doesn't have a sd slot but they are only £10 so all is not lost.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: My last laptop was dreadfully slow and clunky and got worse over the short time I owned it. I bought the new Acer and was astonished at its speed and responsiveness. What a relief. What a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lake

customer_reviews.title: Super fast laptop - looks smart too
customer_reviews.text: This laptop runs super smooth and fast. The fingerprint feature makes it quick to log on. It’s also good for running sims 4 on the best graphics if anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a 10 year old Acer
customer_reviews.text: SDD is like using an iPad. It comes to life immediately. Screen quality is clear and there is no glare.use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Neil Presland

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: slim design. fast and runs soomthly. good price for the performance
customer_reviews.author: MR Y LIU

customer_reviews.title: A reliable laptop for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a few weeks now and have no complaints. The battery life is good, and it's been fast and reliable. If you use your laptop for simple things like email, internet and Microsoft Office then it's good.
customer_reviews.author: MR DAVID BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is hopeless!!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has lasted under 6 months, the charging lead is very fragile and has stopped making a connection, rendering the laptop useless. Having called to customer support telephone number , they hung up 4 times in a row!! Pretty appalling in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: At the moment I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: SSD Mounting Bracket, cable + screws missing
customer_reviews.text: Unable to upgrade - add an extra SSD for the reasons listed in the title.
customer_reviews.author: D'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: This computer battery power failed in 10 months completely!
customer_reviews.text: This computer was a disaster. The cord failed in 3 months. Then the battery stopped working. I now have to place in power point wherever I go. I am hoping seller will help.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish Menlove

customer_reviews.title: It crashed after a month
customer_reviews.text: It crashed without reason just after a month of use. I am still waiting for refund
customer_reviews.author: Ioannis Zografos

customer_reviews.title: Light, great definition and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest laptop I have ever owned, at just under 2kg. It also fits in most laptop bags too, which was a handy bonus. The screen definition was excellent- better than my PC or even our HD TV!. Battery life, advertised at 11 hours, gave me a full day, although it should be noted that I don't use this to watch or stream anything, just for work, emails, writing and browsing. I don't know if that makes a difference. I charge this overnight along with my phone and I've never had any trouble with running out of battery mid-use. It's sleek and slimline and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra and go for apple.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an ACER two years ago to write a book. After covering 350 pages the thing has simply slowed down, almost to a stop. Frustrating to say the least. I was advised to purchase apple, wish I had listened. Not recomended for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: mike charlton

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to repair
customer_reviews.text: If you have a problem like a broken screen it's impossible to get replacements. I have one it's a great paperweight. MAKE SURE YOU GET INSURANCE IT IS VERY VERY FRAGILE.
customer_reviews.author: devoncatt

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire 5 A515-54 15.6-inch Laptop - (Intel Core i5-8265U, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Full HD Display, Windows 10, Black)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Core i5, 512GBTravel with ease and look good doing it with the Aspire 5's thin, light design and sandblasted aluminium top cover. This slender laptop is just 17.95 mm thick and its smooth, tactile finish accentuates the cover’s premium feel and appearance. Your device stays at your side all day with up to 11 hours of battery life. The narrow-bezel design offers more real estate for amazing images. Crisp, true-to-life colours come alive on a 15.6" FHD IPS display with Acer Colour Intelligence. Keep your eyes free from strain and watch or work for long sessions using Acer BlueLightShield. Supercharge your laptop for work and play with an 8th Gen Intel Core processor. Apps load faster, graphics perform better and multitasking is more efficient. Work more effectively with the Precision Touchpad and log in with a single, secure touch via Windows Hello using the embedded fingerprint reader. Maintain a strong, consistent wireless signal with Wi-Fi 5 (aka 802.11ac) and 2x2 MU-MIMO technology. The strategic slot aerial placement helps maximise the portability and wireless performance of your laptop. Turn up the music with Acer True Harmony, bringing you deeper bass and more volume through its innovative speaker design. Command your PC with hands-free ease and experience the freedom of voice control with Microsoft Cortana. No matter what you need to connect, the Aspire 5 has you covered. Accomplish more with a full range of ports, including USB Type-C, 2xUSB 3.1, HDMI1.4 and more. Power-off charging is supported via one of the USB ports, so you'll never be stuck without power.
